# TagProvider.Remove method

Removes a tag from the provider.

```csharp
public bool Remove(Tag tag)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| tag | The tag to remove from the provider. |

## Return Value

Returns true if the tag was removed, or false otherwise.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ArgumentException | The tag is a root tag. |
| InvalidOperationException | The provider is read-only. |
